text: Hello! This is a personality tester developed with the Java game framework libGDX! This is my second project I've ever done, and it took quite a bit of debugging to get to this point, but it was all worth it in the end! Press enter to continue!

This test was modeled after the Pokemon Mystery Dungeon Personality Test, and the two look decently similar. In this test, I will hopefully be able to tell you what your personality is. I am not a licensed psychologist!
Let's begin! Press enter to select an answer, and press the 'up' and 'down' keys to choose answers!
